actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Natural Resources.

actions.subcommittee: National Parks, Forests and Public Lands
actions.text: Referred to the Subcommittee on National Parks, Forests and Public Lands.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on National Parks, Forests, and Public Lands

official_title: To direct the Secretary of the Interior to undertake the necessary feasibility studies regarding the establishment of certain new units of the National Park System in the State of Hawaii.

summary.text: Directs the Secretary of the Interior, acting through the Director of the National Park Service, to study and report to the Congress on the feasibility of establishing specified areas in Hawaii as National Park System units and extending the National Historic Park boundaries at Kalaupapa Settlement.

titles.title: To direct the Secretary of the Interior to undertake the necessary feasibility studies regarding the establishment of certain new units of the National Park System in the State of Hawaii.
